seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 4+ years of experience with at least 2 years in data operations or infrastructure

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL/ELT, and data infrastructure

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both ETL/ELT (batch) and data streaming platforms like Kafka/Kinesis (streaming) in nice-to-have skills

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include collaborating with stakeholders, optimizing pipelines, and contributing to team formation and practices, but no direct reports mentioned

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS mentioned explicitly in qualifications and must-have skills (e.g., AWS Athena, AWS cloud platforms)

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers explicitly mentioned beyond AWS

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/ELT (batch) is a must-have, and Kafka/Kinesis (streaming) is mentioned as nice-to-have, suggesting hybrid paradigm

orchestrator_category.evidence: Dagster, Airflow, and Prefect mentioned explicitly in must-have skills, with no clear primary orchestrator

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions datalake technologies (must-have) and AWS Athena (data warehousing optimization) in qualifications

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid work model requires in-person attendance at Boston office on core days, implying same region (Boston, MA metro)

timezone_focus.evidence: No explicit timezone requirements mentioned beyond hybrid office days

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model allows flexibility but does not mention relocation assistance or requirement

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned explicitly, and 'actively seek applications from all individuals' does not clarify H1B support

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of OPT/CPT or student visa support, and the inclusive language does not imply eligibility for student visas

citizenship_required.evidence: Job posting states 'actively seek applications from all individuals, no matter how they identify' and no work authorization restrictions mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type and benefits mentioned (e.g., equity, ERGs) strongly imply W2 status

benefits_level.evidence: Equity mentioned, ERGs for mentorship/networking, and a 'comprehensive total rewards package' implies premium benefits

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'learning and growth are continuous' and 'investing in developing others' in company description and values

mentorship_signals.evidence: ERGs mentioned for mentorship and development opportunities, and 'Lift As We Climb' value suggests mentorship culture

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths or advancement tracks in the job posting or Pass 1 results

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility, lateral moves, or role changes in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role focuses on technical leadership and data engineering responsibilities without direct reports, and mentions 'Senior Data Engineer' title

requirement_strictness.evidence: Distinct must-have and nice-to-have skills listed, with a balanced ratio between required and preferred qualifications

scope_definition.evidence: Job description and responsibilities are focused on data engineering tasks, with no ambiguity or multi-role hybrid

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Must-have skills align well with 4+ years of experience for a senior data engineering role, no unrealistic expectations detected
